acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped double values with @PodamDoubleValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleDoubleValuesWithThePodamDoubleValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.DoubleValuePojo

Then the Object DoubleRangeValuesPojo ( doubleFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0.0 doubleFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 5.848515416550628 doubleFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 610.2021879160499 doubleFieldWithPreciseValue = 10.1245 doubleObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0.0 doubleObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 25.437686852473757 doubleObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 558.0613203559047 doubleObjectFieldWithPreciseValue = 10.1245 ) should not be null
Then the double value (0} should be greater or equal than 0.0
Then the double value 5.848515416550628 should be lower or equal than 100.0
Then the double value 610.2021879160499 should be between 0.0 and 1000.0
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245
Then the Object 10.1245 should not be null
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245
